Introduction

LST (Korean: 엘에스티; Japanese: エル・エスティ) was a five-member male group under Hyunda Company (now known as He entertainment). Originally as seven, they made their debut on October 12, 2018 with the single "I Wanna Go". Their name stands for "Let's Show Time".

Current state:
disbanded
